What it is: Binds an addiction to a symbolic entity that can be banished.
How to use it: Name the addiction. Ask AI to embody it as a banishable demon with rituals.
What it changes: Creates narrative separation and control over compulsion.

What it is: Constructs a sacred internal temple where your inner child is reparented symbolically.
How to use it: Describe your unmet needs. Ask AI to build a mythic parenting sanctuary.
What it changes: Heals developmental trauma through symbolic repair.

What it is: Visualizes identity fragments and gives them symbolic roles in a psychic council.
How to use it: List conflicting traits. Ask AI to create a symbolic map of your inner factions.
What it changes: Unifies fractured identity under symbolic governance.

What it is: Turns your past traumas into sacred markings that signify earned wisdom.
How to use it: List past harms. Ask AI to ritualize them as symbolic scars with meaning.
What it changes: Rewrites trauma as sacred badge of insight.

What it is: Summons grace into a situation that seems beyond redemption.
How to use it: Describe the situation. Ask AI to channel a mythic source of undeserved mercy.
What it changes: Restores hope where logic would reject it.

What it is: Designs a symbolic ritual space to promote deep, myth-infused rest.
How to use it: Describe sleep troubles. Ask AI to build a mythic dream chamber.
What it changes: Transforms rest into sacred regenerative ritual.

What it is: Interprets obsessive cravings as symbolic needs misnamed.
How to use it: Describe a recurring craving. Ask AI to decode its true psychic origin.
What it changes: Separates need from compulsion by clarifying root cause.

What it is: Identifies sacred beliefs you've outgrown and ritualizes their dismantling.
How to use it: Name the belief. Ask AI to perform a symbolic demolition ritual.
What it changes: Releases false sacredness with honor and precision.

What it is: Shows who you become if you follow your current path too long.
How to use it: Describe your pattern. Ask AI to project the mythic end-state as warning.
What it changes: Creates corrective foresight through symbolic time travel.

What it is: Locates the symbolic center of your psyche and restores it.
How to use it: Describe your sense of self. Ask AI to construct and fortify the sacred core.
